name: Lava Birds - Cave Escape
description:
Game Features:
- Free to play
- Endless gameplay
- Simple Tap Tap control
- Challenge your friends with the best high score


Climb up the Volcano Cave and Escape Lava
Collect coins to Unlock New Amazing Birds
Tap Right to jump Right, Tap Left To Jump Left
Be very fast and escape Lava
Set New Records

We Have worked a lot on this game and game play. Have polished the Design, and many hours have tested to make it very interesting

Birds ar very cheap, you just have to play a few times to unlock new bird
